attributes.action: Go forward with plans to build a £100 Million mega Mosque.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I think that it would show how tolerant we are of other religions to build a large Mosque for people to worship at. Those who say that it would incite violence give not only christians, but a large part of England, a bad name. So I urge you to sign this petition, whatever your religion, as long as you belive in tolerance.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Go forward with plans to build a £100 Million mega Mosque."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page14593.asp

Prime Minister's Office
